name: Smogland
detailed_description:
Game Features
- 2 Game Modes
- 7 Heroes with unique skills
- 6 game worlds
- 60 handcrafted levels
- 20+ different weapon (ranged/melee)
- Steam leaderboard
- Steam achievements

Background Story
Your spaceship returned to Earth.

There's no welcome home party. No cheers. No applause. No one.

The planet looks dark and dead, and is completely radio silent.

Meanwhile a half-broken Dyson Sphere floats in the sky, covering what's left of the sun.

It doesn't matter much any more.

You have to land now - despite of a functional fusion engine, the tritium energy core is depleting fast and wouldn't make it back to the green planet you discovered.

After landing, the ship scanned all possible communication channels across the globe but only detected one weak signal. With the ship fuel depleted, there's no other choice - you decide to help the ground survivors trace the weak signal, in hopes of finding an answer, and a way to escape Earth.

short_description: The story is set in the far future. Earth is in ruins. The survivors are tracing the last detectable radio signal through strange portals while fighting off waves of different lifeforms across the lands, in hopes of finding an answer, and a way to escape Earth.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Desktop i5 Gen 2 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GT 430 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Desktop i7 Gen 4 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Gefore GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
